alert.note: Alert for Clayton; Cobb; DeKalb; North Fulton; South Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 6:01PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern DeKalb, southeastern Cobb, central Fulton and northwestern Clayton Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 600 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Turner Field, or over Atlanta, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Decatur, Sandy Springs, Smyrna, East Point, Forest Park, College Park, Clarkston, Hapeville, Avondale Estates, Lake City, North Decatur, North Atlanta, Hartsfield-Jackson Airport, North Druid Hills, Midtown, Grant Park-Zoo Atlanta, Druid Hills, Belvedere Park and Candler-Mcafee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
